alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Logan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 03 at 10:22PM CDT until June 03 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LINCOLN AND SOUTHEASTERN LOGAN COUNTIES... At 1021 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of Stapleton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Logan. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 233 and 245. Highway 83 between mile markers 103 and 109. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
